motions.title: Move Recognition Item to #2
motions.description: Motion to amend the agenda to move item #3 (Recognition of Chief Judge Rick Powell) up to #2.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • August 26, 2024 meeting minutes • Second quarter 2024 budget amendment • Amendment to agreement with DeKalb - Lake Ridge, LLC for sanitary sewer easement • Funding authorization for stormwater repairs at multiple locations (1480 Old Spring House Lane, 4752 Village North Court, 5209 Fleur De Lis Court, 2160 Dunwoody Glen)

motions.title: Contract Amendment with Blount Construction
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment with Blount Construction for additional paving on Perimeter Center Parkway including $50,000 worth of additional paving near Hammond.

specialEvents.title: Medal of Meritorious Service Presentation
specialEvents.description: Chief Carlson presented Medal of Meritorious Award to Sgt. Harold (Trey) Nelson for saving an 18-month-old from choking using LifeVac Device funded by Dunwoody Police Foundation.

specialEvents.title: Recognition of Chief Judge Rick Powell
specialEvents.description: Recognition of Chief Judge Rick Powell with certificate for 25 years of service to State of Georgia and 15 years as judge within the city.

discussionItems.title: Chamblee Dunwoody Bridge Enhancement Design Update
discussionItems.description: Update on possible bridge enhancement designs including railings, lighting, columns, paint treatments, and pedestrian improvements. Three levels of enhancements presented.
discussionItems.presenter: Michael Smith and Winston Mitchell (Kimley Horn)
